#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
   int t,i,j;
   scanf("%d",&t);
   while(t--)
   {
      int ship,men,women,child;
      scanf("%d%d%d%d",&ship,&men,&women,&child);
      int m=0,w=0,c=0,s=0;
      while(s<ship)
      {
       if(child>0&&((m+w)>=(c+1)/4.0))
       {
         c++;
         s++;
         child--;
         }
        else if(women>0&&(m>=(w+1)/2.0))
        {
          w++;
          s++;
          women--;
          }
        else if(men>0)
        {
          m++;
          s++;
          men--;
          }
        else
         break;
       }
       printf("%d %d %d\n",m,w,c);
   }
   return 0;
}
